product_name: Dr. BrandtNeedles No More No More Baggage Eye De-Puffing Gel
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingGive BackDr. Brandt's Needles No More No More Baggage Eye De-Puffing Gel is an instantly-gratifying solution for aging skin, inspired by in-office procedures. Designed to provide both immediate, visible tightening and long-term wrinkle reduction.
details: DetailsBenefitsAn advanced solution for fine lines and wrinkles, made with 96% ingredients of natural origin and designed to provide clinically-inspired resultsPerfect for anybody seeking a well-rested and stress-free under-eye area.Key IngredientsFilmatrix: A second-skin technology that forms an invisible tightening film, smoothing the look of expression lines in minutes.Item 2624297How To UseUse in the morning after your eye moisturizer and/or in the evening if you are going out and want fresh-looking under-eyes! Squeeze a small amount between your fingers for 5-6 seconds to warm up the product slightly (warming between your fingertips is very important as it will make the application more effective and comfortable). Gently pat (not rub) directly on bags and dark circles. Use alone or under make-up. For best results let dry in between applications.IngredientsWater (Aqua) Sodium Magnesium Silicate Propanediol Magnesium Aluminum Silicate Phenoxyethanol Lecithin Kappaphycus Alvarezii Extract Caffeine Synthetic Fluorphlogopite Acetyl Glutamine Hesperidin Methyl Chalcone Caesalpinia Spinosa Fruit Extract Titanium Dioxide Caprylyl Glycol Ethylhexylglycerin Hexylene Glycol Steareth-20 Sh-Oligopeptide-1 Sh- Oligopeptide-2 Dipeptide-2 Sodium Hyaluronate Sh-Polypeptide-1 Sh- Polypeptide-9 Sh-Polypeptide-11 Bacillus/Soybean/Folic Acid Ferment Boswellia Serrata Extract Centella Asiatica Extract Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7 Butylene Glycol Betula Alba Bark Extract Chlorhexidine Digluconate Tin Oxide 1,2-Hexanediol Potassium Sorbate Polygonum Cuspidatum Root Extract Peg-12 Dimethicone Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract Sodium Benzoate Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Use in the morning after your eye moisturizer and/or in the evening if you are going out and want fresh-looking under-eyes! Squeeze a small amount between your fingers for 5-6 seconds to warm up the product slightly (warming between your fingertips is very important as it will make the application more effective and comfortable). Gently pat (not rub) directly on bags and dark circles. Use alone or under make-up. For best results let dry in between applications.

2-Hexanediol Potassium Sorbate Polygonum Cuspidatum Root Extract Peg-12 Dimethicone Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract Sodium Benzoate Iron Oxides (Ci 77491

reviews.headline: Would not purchase again
reviews.comments: I was excited to get the product and tried it immediately. I've used it many times and notice no improvement in my under eye bags. It's quite thick and doesn't apply easily. I tried warming it between my fingers as directions state, but if you do that it just rubs into your fingers and there is nothing left for your eyes. Big waste of money for me!

reviews.headline: Temporary fix
reviews.comments: Basically what this eye cream does is tighten the area underneath your eye and stretch it out, which definitely feels a little weird on my skin, but significantly helped to reduce the bags under my skin. I don't think this is a product meant to for long-term use â€“ it won't help reverse signs of aging â€“ but it will help to lift your eyes temporarily. I would use a different product if you are looking for long-term benefits, but it works for a night out or somerning like that.

reviews.headline: Great if you use correctly
reviews.comments:
Warm up the gel between fingertips. Pat it on over your eye bags. Wait a few min without moving your face.  This will last 6-8 hours unless you get it wet. Its great for an evening out.  
Prior to this product I used Sudden Change. It was harder to apply and if you used to much you got a white film and flakiness. Thats why I prefer the Dr Brandt product. 
Sadly ive never been apply to get it to play well with makeup so I dont use makeup under my eyes. The gel has a peachy tint so it looks good with no makeup over it.

reviews.headline: No more puffy eyes
reviews.comments: I love this! It takes away the puffiness under my eyes. It feels soothing when I put it on and lasts all day. I use it a few times a week when I really need a lift.

reviews.headline: Did Nothing
reviews.comments: I was hoping this would diminish my eye puffiness & dark circles. But after 2 weeks of using I compared with pictures and did not see any difference. I am in my 40s and have dryness too and sensitive skin. So I tried under and over moisturizer. Did not cause irritation but did have a slight orange cast. Unfortunately I ended up returning.

reviews.headline: Didn't work for me
reviews.comments: I tried it for a week and never noticed anything but dried flakes under my eyes. I never felt or saw any tightening effect. Disappointing because it was so well reviewed.

reviews.headline: Not for me
reviews.comments:
As soon as I put the gel under my eyes I felt it pulling
And it looked better. When I woke up in the morning my eyes were so swollen and puffy.  I immediately returned product.

reviews.headline: No more bags at 57!
reviews.comments: 4 weeks from more years over 50 and this product is a daily use under my make up to smooth out my under eye area!!

reviews.headline: No more bags at 57!
reviews.comments: 4 weeks from more years over 50 and this product is a daily use under my make up to smooth out my under eye area!!

reviews.headline: Works - if applied right
reviews.comments: I do think this is the best product out there to de-puff those under eye bags but you must watch the videos etc available.  I cleanse, moisture, apply primer (if I'm doong a full face of makeup)- warm up a little b/w the pads of my fingers - then dab on.  Let that dry and finish your makeup routine.

reviews.headline: Terrible
reviews.comments: I ordered this because it looks like the original but buyer beware its the new revised version which is terrible. They ate trying to pass this off as the original but its a terribke version, dies not work and i have to wait 30 days for my mobeu back.  I wonder if they woyld  have waited for 30  days for my oayment.  Overall worst experience ever with a store and product.  I will never shop here again and would suggest you be very wary of this store and it service

reviews.headline: Nope
reviews.comments: Skip it- The formula is chunky and hard to squeeze out of the package. I applied this in the morning and it looks terrible (cakey) under makeup. I did not see any results from this, i rubbed it between my fingers to warm up as instructions say - expensive and disappointing- I Trashed it!

reviews.headline: Doesn't do anything
reviews.comments: Doesn't work at all.  Waste of money.  Still have baggage

reviews.headline: No more baggage
reviews.comments: Love this! It truly works. No flakes, my favorite antibag cream

reviews.headline: No more bags
reviews.comments: I just tried this and it does feel tighter! Ladies,follow the instructions! Warm it up first and then put it on your bags. I am truly impressed ðŸ’œ

reviews.headline: Yay! It works!
reviews.comments: Love this product!!  Honestly, I have not found a better product.  Careful with the amount you use each application.  Too much can leave an orange residue.  I definitely recommend.  Got it in a Birch Box & have been a fan since!

reviews.headline: Good Morning Bags
reviews.comments: expensive product that didn't work for me . it seemed too thick and hard to apply. color was strange and didn't blend with my skin.

reviews.headline: Great for depuffing
reviews.comments: I've used this product for several years and thought they pulled it off the market. work great to deputy and make you appear more awake. the trick is to warm the product with your fingers and pat on.

reviews.headline: It actually WORKS!
reviews.comments:
Thanks to genetics, stress, and motherhood I typically look like garbage. My eye area is puffy and dark even when I get plenty of sleep. I have tried so many eye creams that promise to make a difference then fail miserably. 
I was skeptical about this eye cream, especially at this high of a price point, but I had heard really good things about it. I finally purchased it a month ago and I only wish I bought it sooner.
Literally within 3 minutes of applying the eye cream I can feel and see the undereye area tighten and depuff! It's incredible!!! 

The only downside is I have sensitive skin, especially around my eyes, and it becomes dry and itchy quickly. I have to apply moisturizer first before applying the eye cream. If I don't out down that base layer of moisturizer my eyes become extremely itchy throughout the day. I also don't use it on my eyelids. I only apply it underneath.
Makeup applies easily over top!

reviews.headline: So drying
reviews.comments: I just hot this today and was bery excited. It was very hard to squtout of the tube. I thought it was dried out. It is not like a gel at all, more like a paste. I put it on and yes it did shrink my bag and ever the darkness was releived. But i feel like I have a coating of sandpaper under my eye. The skin is turning red too. I'm pretty disappointed, I really wanted to like this.

media.headline: Effective but doesn't play wall with other products

faceoff_positive.comments: I bought something last year for $ 150 for puffy under eye issues. It did work, but there was a big learning curve. Got a sample of Dr. Brandt's needles no more ...way smaller learning curve and it worked better. Just purchased a full sized tube...happy camper here!!
faceoff_positive.headline: Yep...it works!

faceoff_negative.comments: I had high hopes for this product.  I am older and the bags under my eyes are due to skin sagging with the under eye fat pad drooping.  It did nothing for this type of eye bag.  I tried several applications, making sure it was on clean skin and allowing each application to dry before the next was applied.  There was absolutely no change.
faceoff_negative.headline: Results Not As Expected
